about_the_game:
Developed by INGAME, the war-themed game DeathGearX has been released on the Microsoft Store! As a rising star in the mech game genre, it has garnered significant attention by perfectly blending TPS (third-person shooter) and RTS (real-time strategy) elements. Here, you can experience the allure of mechs, upgrade your favorite vehicles, and pilot your custom-built war machines to conquer the battlefield!

DeathGearX is a war-themed game that combines the characteristics of both TPS and RTS genres. In the game, you can collect numerous vehicles, including tanks, robots, and jeeps, and engage in fierce battles by upgrading and modifying these large weapons. You can also enjoy the thrill of real-time multiplayer battles, experiencing the intense and brutal battlefield! Moreover, you can team up with friends, fighting side by side to dominate the battlefield together!

The story is set in the near future, where advancements in human technology have led to widespread use of AI in military applications. Unfortunately, a malfunction in some AI defense units caused them to attack civilians indiscriminately, sparking a war between AI forces and humans. In the game, you start with a basic vehicle, which you can transform into an unparalleled war machine through upgrades and modifications as your skills and resources grow. You will need to pilot this vehicle, lead your troops, and fight against the formidable AI army to save the human world.

As you progress through the game, you will acquire more vehicles to enhance your arsenal and gather sufficient resources to upgrade your vehicles to face the ever-changing, brutal battlefield.

Game Features
• 3V3 Real-Time Battles with Diverse Modes!
The game offers a realistic and intense competitive battlefield for players, featuring various PVP modes such as "Base Assault," "Area Capture," and "Team Deathmatch." Employ different strategies on different maps to conquer the battlefield and enjoy the fun of RTS!
• Team Up with Friends for Collaborative Combat!
Players can team up with friends to complete combat missions and earn generous rewards!
• Exciting Solo Campaign
The game includes at least 30 meticulously designed solo campaign levels. Here, you will upgrade and modify your war machines, lead human troops, and fight against the AI network to become the hero who saves the world!
• Collect and Modify Over 18 Unique Mechs and Vehicles
With tanks, armored vehicles, robots, and more, the game features a rich array of powerful mechs and vehicles. Coupled with over 12 next-gen weapon skills, you can fully experience the charm of mech combat! Collect resources and chips to modify your vehicles, making them increasingly powerful and the key to dominating the battlefield!
